title: Visa Lookup Actor Input
description: Provide a passport nationality and a destination country to retrieve visa requirements, allowed stay rules, and official notes. Optional language selection enables localized output. The actor validates availability at runtime and returns a clear result even if no visa data is found.

nationality.title: Nationality
nationality.description: Passport nationality (e.g., Indian, United States, Canadian).

destination.title: Destination Country
destination.description: Destination country to check visa requirements for.

language.title: Output Language
language.description: ISO language code for localized output (e.g. en, fr, es, de, hi)

maxRequestsPerCrawl.title: Max Requests per Crawl
maxRequestsPerCrawl.description: Maximum number of requests that can be made by this crawler. Default is 1 because this actor performs a single lookup.
